div.h1: Tailoring Software That Fits Your Workflow Like A Custom Suit
div.p: Our Tailoring Management System is specially tailored for tailor shops to manage measurements, orders, inventory, and billing, fully integrated with a powerful POS system.

a.class: btn rippler rippler-default sh_call_to_action_btn sh_talk_to_us btn-1

div.h2: What is a Tailoring Management System?
div.p: A Tailoring Management System is an all-in-one software solution that helps tailoring businesses and manage key operations. This system helps your tailoring shop in many ways. It handles BOMS, customer measurements, and order tracking. It also manages inventory, sales, purchasing, accounting, manufacturing, and POS integration. This makes your shop more efficient and keeps customers happy.

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-12 mx-auto d-block align-self-center

div.h2: Why Your Business Needs a Tailoring Management System
div.p: Modern tailoring is more than needle and thread—it's about customer satisfaction, order precision, and timely delivery. A robust management system helps you:

div.h2: Key Features of Tailoring Management System
div.p: Our Tailoring Management System helps improve every part of your tailoring business. This includes order booking and final delivery. These features include smart automation, POS integration, and centralized control. They ensure accuracy, speed, and growth for modern tailoring operations.

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-12 mx-auto d-block

div.p: Easily book tailoring orders through an intuitive POS interface. Each order is linked to customer profiles, measurements, and BOMs. Real-time tracking gives full visibility into order status from booking to delivery.

Store, manage, and reuse customer measurements directly from the POS. All measurements are safely stored in the customer’s profile for future orders. This improves accuracy and speeds up repeat business.

Maintain real-time stock levels of fabrics, linings, buttons, and accessories. The system auto-deducts inventory upon order confirmation via POS and provides alerts for low stock, ensuring seamless production planning.

Manage stitching workflows from sample creation to final fitting. The system creates Manufacturing Orders (MOs) based on BOMs. These are triggered when an order is made through the POS. This allows for customized production for each order.
Auto-generate invoices directly from the POS once orders are confirmed. Supports multiple tax setups, discounts, and payment methods to ensure fast, error-free billing.
Schedule and manage garment deliveries directly from the POS. Delivery status can be updated in real-time, and customers can receive automatic notifications for pickup or delivery.
Manage multiple tailoring shops or production units from a centralized system. Each branch can have separate POS terminals, inventory, and staff permissions all synced under one dashboard.
Assign role-based permissions to staff for POS, order, inventory, and finance access. Ensure data security and smooth task distribution with user-level controls.
Modify existing customer measurements from the POS. Any changes can trigger an approval workflow to ensure accuracy before production begins, preventing errors in garment fitting.

Our all-in-one Tailoring Management System makes your daily tasks easier and improves your brand experience. Whether you're managing a single boutique or multiple branches, here’s how our solution helps you stay ahead:

div.div: Delight customers with faster service, accurate fittings, and professional communication - all managed through a streamlined POS interface.
Avoid costly mistakes with centralized measurement storage, POS-based order handling, and built-in approval workflows before production begins.
From creating orders to generating invoices and issuing raw materials, automate repetitive tasks. This lets you focus more on growing your business.
Make smarter decisions with real-time reports on sales, inventory, orders, and deliveries — all accessible from one dashboard.
Digitize your tailoring process. This includes customer records and billing. Show your brand with a modern, tech-savvy look.

div.h2: Benefits of Using a Tailoring Management System
div.p: Make your tailoring operations smoother, smarter, and more scalable with the right software. Here are the top benefits of using a tailored POS-based system for your business:

Our Tailoring Management System helps many tailoring businesses. It offers strong tools and built-in integration for different needs. No matter if you run a small tailor shop or a big clothing factory, this system can help you. It can make your processes easier, increase accuracy, and boost customer satisfaction.

Perfect for small businesses looking to simplify their daily operations. Manage customer orders, measurements, and inventory with ease, all through a single, integrated platform. Ideal for those who want to avoid manual errors and improve customer service, like Fashion Retail Software.

Suppose your business specializes in custom clothing or made-to-order garments. In that case, this system is designed to manage complex customer measurements and order specifications, making the production process smoother and more accurate.

Tailoring businesses that focus on bulk orders, such as uniforms for companies or schools, can benefit from our system’s bulk fitting workflow and approval processes. Manage sample production, customer approvals, and large orders effortlessly.

Our Tailoring Management System integrates POS with order management and manufacturing workflows, making it ideal for clothing manufacturers. From material issuance to delivery, it offers a comprehensive solution for every step of the garment production process.

div.p: Whether you need help with features, want to request a demo, or just have questions, we're here to assist you at every stitch of your business journey.
